thought: The first step in the plan is to craft jungle_planks, which requires me to place 1 stripped_jungle_wood into the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the stripped_jungle_wood from slot 32 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1
